scripts.build: cd frontend && npm ci && npm run build && rm -rf ../dist && cp -R dist ../dist
scripts.dev:all: echo 'Run dev:backend and dev:frontend in two separate terminals'
scripts.cbc: cd frontend && npm ci && npm run build && cd .. && rm -rf dist && cp -R frontend/dist ./dist && npx cap sync ios && npx cap open ios
scripts.cbc2: cd frontend && npm run build && cd .. && rm -rf dist && cp -R frontend/dist ./dist && npx cap sync ios
